data.title: Danielle Bernier, Chief Marketing Officer
data.meta_description: Learn more about Haley & Aldrich team member Danielle Bernier's role in helping clients solve their most pressing environmental and geotechnical engineering challenges.
data.text:
Danielle leads Haley & Aldrich’s branding, marketing, and internal communications efforts. She works with the Haley & Aldrich team to develop and communicate the firm’s value proposition to deliver value and efficiency by acting on clients’ needs and advocating on their behalf.

Danielle joined the firm after working in the management consulting industry, where she managed marketing efforts for global operational strategy consulting firm PRTM, later acquired by PwC.

Checkmark Creates differentiated stories and messaging that connect with clients’ values

Checkmark Leads the company’s efforts to be recognized as delivering exceptional client experiences

Checkmark Develops marketing team members to achieve their full potential

“The most rewarding aspect of my role is to work with our staff to deeply understand what our clients value and uncover how Haley & Aldrich uniquely delivers on that value.”
